snippet: A group of Facebook shareholders were paid $100 apiece for ceding voting control of their stock to Mark Zuckerberg, the company's co-founder and chief executive.
abstract: A group of Facebook shareholders were paid $100 apiece for ceding voting control of their stock to Mark Zuckerberg, the company's co-founder and chief executive.
lead_paragraph: Mark Zuckerberg must be one persuasive deal maker.
